field.name: field
field.description: The input field that the error was related to

caller.name: caller
caller.description: The id of the user that initiated this operation

clientNumber.name: clientNumber
clientNumber.description: A client number. Sometimes used when communicating with external system. Must be unique if specified.

country.name: country
country.description: The country code that best matches the organization unit. If unspecified the platform default will be set.

displayName.name: displayName
displayName.description: The name shown for the organization unit

externalId.name: externalId
externalId.description: The external id (foreign key). Must not exceed 255 characters.

parent.name: parent
parent.description: A Organization Unit id of the parent Organization Unit (optional).

email.name: email
email.description: The email of the user. If no user exists with the specified email a user will be created with default values and the specified email.

extid.name: extid
extid.description: An optional external id for the participation

country.name: country
country.description: The country code. Default value will be used if not specified

createdBy.name: createdBy
createdBy.description: The id of the user that created the project. If the creator is not known this value can be *null* or not specified

designId.name: designId
designId.description: The id of the design this project should be based on

locale.name: locale
locale.description: The primary locale for this project. Default value will be used if not specified

name.name: name
name.description: The internal name of the project

timezone.name: timezone
timezone.description: The main timezone for the project. Do not specify for default timezone

userDescription.name: userDescription
userDescription.description: The description presented to participants. Do not specify for default value from design

userTitle.name: userTitle
userTitle.description: The title presented to participants. Do not specify for default value from design

displayName.name: displayName
displayName.description: The name shown when the user is listed

externalId.name: externalId
externalId.description: The external id (foreign key). Must not exceed 255 characters.

firstName.name: firstName
firstName.description: The first (given) name of the user

hardLock.name: hardLock
hardLock.description: True if the user should be locked from the system

homeOrg.name: homeOrg
homeOrg.description: The primary organization for the user. Must match the id of an Organization Unit.

locale.name: locale
locale.description: The user's preferred language/locale setting. Affects date and number formatting.

primaryEmail.name: primaryEmail
primaryEmail.description: The primary email for the user. Used for communication from the platform.

uuid.name: uuid
uuid.description: UUID of user to add to this group.

created.name: created
created.description: The time this entry was created

createdBy.name: createdBy
createdBy.description: UUID of the user that created this entry.

enabled.name: enabled
enabled.description: True if this design is enabled for use

locked.name: locked
locked.description: The time when this entry was locked or null

lockedBy.name: lockedBy
lockedBy.description: UUID of the user that has locked this design

lockedDesign.name: lockedDesign
lockedDesign.description: True if this design is locked for editing

sticky.name: sticky
sticky.description: True if this design is sticky

field.name: field
field.description: The input field that the error was related to

createdBy.name: createdBy
createdBy.description: UUID of the user that created this group.

parent.name: parent
parent.description: Id of parent group, null if group has no parent.

softiId.name: softiId
softiId.description: Alternative unique ID for the group.

updated.name: updated
updated.description: Timestamp when group was last modified.

updatedBy.name: updatedBy
updatedBy.description: UUID of the user that last updated this group.

externalId.name: externalId
externalId.description: The external id (foreign key). Must not exceed 255 characters.

id.name: id
id.description: Unique identifier representing a specific organization unit. Id numbers are never reused.

parentId.name: parentId
parentId.description: Unique identifier of the parent or *null* if there is no parent.

type.name: type
type.description: The organization unit type. The only type is *client* at the moment.

accessLink.name: accessLink
accessLink.description: A link to access this particular participation. The link requires the user to login. Users that access the platform the first time must set a password. This value is null if this participation is not activated.

activated.name: activated
activated.description: True if this participation has been activated and can be used

errorMessage.name: errorMessage
errorMessage.description: An optional error message that may describe why the participation is in error state.

expiration.name: expiration
expiration.description: The timestamp when this participation will expire. Expiration never happens if this value is *null*.

externalId.name: externalId
externalId.description: The external id (foreign key). Must not exceed 255 characters.

firstAccess.name: firstAccess
firstAccess.description: The timestamp when the participant accessed the project for the first time. This value can be null

firstActivation.name: firstActivation
firstActivation.description: The timestamp when this participation was first activated. This value can be null

firstMail.name: firstMail
firstMail.description: The timestamp when the first mail was sent to this participant. This value can be null

id.name: id
id.description: Unique identifier representing this participation. Id numbers are never reused

inError.name: inError
inError.description: True if this participation is in an error state. The user is not able to access participations that are in error state.

lastAccess.name: lastAccess
lastAccess.description: The timestamp when the participant accessed the project the last time. This value can be null

lastActivation.name: lastActivation
lastActivation.description: The timestamp when this participation was last activated. This value can be null

lastMail.name: lastMail
lastMail.description: The timestamp when the last mail was sent to this participant. This value can be null

projectId.name: projectId
projectId.description: The id of the project this participation belongs to

userId.name: userId
userId.description: The id of the user this participation belongs to

adminUrl.name: adminUrl
adminUrl.description: URL to the page where project administration can be done. Administrative access is still required when accessing the url.

created.name: created
created.description: The timestamp when this project was created.

createdBy.name: createdBy
createdBy.description: The id of the user that created the project. If the creator is not known this value is *null*

designId.name: designId
designId.description: The id of the design this project are using or null if no design is used

externalId.name: externalId
externalId.description: The external id (foreign key). Must not exceed 255 characters.

id.name: id
id.description: Unique identifier representing a specific project. Id numbers are never reused.

locale.name: locale
locale.description: The primary locale for this project

name.name: name
name.description: The internal name of the project

orgId.name: orgId

status.name: status
status.description: Project status. Can be either ACTIVATED, NEW or DISABLED

timezone.name: timezone
timezone.description: The main timezone for the project

userDescription.name: userDescription
userDescription.description: The description presented to participants. This value can be *null*.

userid.name: userid
userid.description: The id of the user that created the project. If the creator is not known this value is *null*

methods.description:
The orgunits endpoint returns information about the available organization units (orgunits).
The response includes the display name, internal and external id and client number.

409.description: An organization with the same clientNumber or external id already existed.

methods.description: Adds an Organization Unit

200.description: A response with an organization unit

methods.description:
Returns information about the specified organization unit.
The response includes the display name, internal and external id and client number.

409.description: An organization with the same clientNumber or external id already existed.

methods.description: Adds an Organization Unit
Returns the available projects for the organization unit

201.description: The project was succesfully created created.

methods.description: Creates a new project
Returns project information

404.description: The project could not be found

406.description: The project could not be delted due to constraints

methods.description: Deletes the project. The project can only be deleted if the project do not contain any participants.
Updates information about a project. Values are only updated if the fields are specified in the input
Returns project participants

409.description: Participant with the same email already existed. Location header contains the url to the already existing participant.

methods.description: Add a user to the project. Participant information is created for the user. In the body object, only one of either email or userid must be specified. The participant needs to be activated before it the user can access it.

409.description: The delete failed due to internal constraints

methods.description:
Deletes a participant. The user itself will still remain but any state related to the project will be deleted. 
It might not be possible due to constraints from the products in the project to delete the participant. However
this can only be determined at the time of the delete. If a delete fails the participant will have their inError
flag set.

406.description: The participant could not be activated

422.description: The participant could not be activated due to invalid project state

methods.description: Activates a participant so that it can be used

200.description: A generated one time use login link

422.description: The participant is not in a state where a loginlink is possible to get

methods.description:
Returns a single sign on link for the participant. The link is only usable once and should be used directly. The link expires after a few minutes.

This operation requires the *login link* permission.

uuid.name: uuid

limit.name: limit
limit.description: The maximum number of users to return

offset.name: offset
offset.description: The offset to start listing users from

headers.name: X-More
headers.description: Indicates if there are more users available

methods.description: Lists all users. Only api callers that have full access can call this method.

409.description: A user with the same primary email already existed.

methods.description: Adds a user. No two users can have the same email address. Email is saved WITH case but compared regardless of case. Email can be changed for a user assuming it doesn't cause a conflict.
Returns information about a user

409.description: A user with the same primary email already existed.

methods.description: Updates a user. All values that have a key defined in the input will be set. So if a value should not be updated omit it totally from the input, otherwise it will be unset.

200.description: An image. Check the Content-Type header to determine which type the returned image have

methods.description:
Returns a thumbnail picture of the user. This can either be a selected picture or an auto generated image. This method doesn't require a full sign in. The api key is sufficient.
The image is square and is likely, but not necessary, to be in 128x128 PNG format. However the format will always be either PNG, JPEG or GIF.
Returns information about the projects the user is a participant in. Only the projects that the current token have access to will be listed.
methods.displayName: Returns information about the projects the user is a participant in.
